t: How to Submit Auto Part Fitment Data to Amazon - RSM Technology
s: April 7, 2023 - Use AMTU tool to submit your full feeds to Amazon, creating one file for each brand. The first step is to ensure that you have a full list of product information ready to go, preferably in spreadsheet form. The more data you have, the better.
